title: Code Meets Cupertino: Apple Tools For Tech Teams!
description: For dev teams, Mac is often the default—but managing scale, support, and updates shouldn’t slow you down. In 20 minutes, we’ll show you how to : * Equip your engineers with high-performance Macs at corporate rates * Access fast repair + loaner programs via iStore’s Apple-certified team * Simplify device management with zero-touch deployment // About Us// https://istorestm.com/business-program/ Hosted by iStore by St. Moritz—an Authorized Apple Premier Partner that's trusted by 500+ corporatios. With over 25 years of experience, we specializing in bridging Apple’s innovative products with personalized support and solutions for startups. Join us to unlock enterprise-level benefits without the enterprise-level requirements. This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com
